channel.title: Game Crashing
channel.description:
Its crashing mostly when I hit the ESC key to pull up the menu. Wish you guys would make the attachment uploader work the dump files ".dmp" that you request... You can't really fix things without knowing exactly whats going on.
Also its giving me an error at upload of the .dmp saying "File extension is invalid."
